console.log("âœ… DONE! GameLogic is now the owner.");
await nft.transferOwnership(gameLogicAddress);
console.log("Transferring ownership to GameLogic...");
// 3. Transfer Keys
const nft = await ethers.getContractAt("CarbonGhostNFT", nftAddress);
// 2. Get Contract
const gameLogicAddress = process.env.GAME_LOGIC_ADDRESS;
const nftAddress = process.env.GHOST_NFT_ADDRESS;
// 1. Setup - Paste your NEW addresses from .env here
await oracle2.setCarbonIntensity(450);
await oracle2.carbonIntensity();
const oracle2 = await ethers.getContractAt("CarbonIntensityOracle", process.env.ORACLE_ADDRESS);
const oracle = await ethers.getContractAt("CarbonIntensityOracle", process.env.ORACLE_ADDRESS);
const oracle = await ethers.getContractAt("CarbonIntensityOracle", "PASTE_ADDRESS_HERE");
